title: Pete Buttigieg, Sanctuary Cities, Mueller
itunes:title: Pete Buttigieg, Sanctuary Cities, Mueller
description:
Kevin discussed the latest on President Trump's trade and immigration policy, 2020 presidential politics and the release of the Mueller report with guests Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media, Mattie Dupler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and Jorge Lima, Senior Vice President of Policy at Americans for Prosperity.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
